data.name: Tower!3D - EGKK airport
data.detailed_description:
IATA: LGW, ICAO: EGKK is a major international airport near Crawley in West Sussex, southeast England, 29.5 miles (47.5 km) south of Central London. It is the second-busiest airport by total passenger traffic in the United Kingdom, after London Heathrow.

The airport has two terminals, the North Terminal and the South Terminal. It operates as a single-runway airport, using a main runway with a length of 3,316 m (10,879 ft). A secondary runway is available but, due to its proximity to the main runway, can only be used if that is out of use.

Fun fact: in the real-world Gatwick airport is using a single runway for takeoffs and landing and use the second runway for taxi operation. This feature is simulated in the add-on.

Features
- Detailed graphic design
- 3D modelled airport buildings
- Dynamic lighting and shadows, day-night cycles provide a stunning visual experience
- Live airport with service cars for airplanes and vehicle traffic around the airports

To add more realism to your game, find the Real Color Add-on on FeelThere's website.

data.short_description: a major international airport near Crawley in West Sussex, southeast England, 29.5 miles (47.5 km) south of Central London. It is the second-busiest airport by total passenger traffic in the United Kingdom, after London Heathrow.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 7 Pro / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Tower!3D
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB dedicated video card
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Tower!3D
